node.title: Livestream: Minister Verrall outlines three-phase approach to managing Omicron
node.description: The Associate Health Minister is joined by the Director-General of Health.
node.content: ["This livestream is expected to start at 2pm.\u00a0", "Associate Health Minister Dr Ayesha Verrall is joined by Director-General of Health Dr Ashley Bloomfield to provide an update on the Government's three-phase approach to managing Omicron.\u00a0", "Dr Verrall is expected to reveal how long COVID-19 cases and contacts will have to be isolated for when we move into the next phase, which will happen when Omicron cases reach more than 1000 a day.\u00a0", "Watch the livestream.\u00a0", "App users watch here.\u00a0"]
